sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

Consider the below figure. It is given that JI and KH are perpendicular to HI . If \(HK = 6 \) cm, \(IJ = 3 \) cm, and area of triangle ILJ is 250 cm\(^2\), then find the area of the triangle HLK .
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "In the triangles ILJ and HLK , we have 
\[
	\angle I = \angle H 
\]
\[
	\angle ILJ = \angle HLK 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From these two, we can write that
\[
	\Delta ILJ = \Delta HLK 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write that
\[
	\frac{\textrm{area of } \Delta ILJ }{\textrm{area of } \Delta HLK } = \frac{IJ ^2 }{HK ^2}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{250 }{\textrm{area of } \Delta HLK } = \frac{9 }{36 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \textrm{area of } \Delta HLK = 1000.0 cm^2
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
